tool_description: Use this API to make searches on DuckDuckGo with ease. Just insert the search query and receive the top results.
name: Duck Duck Go Search API
title: Duck Duck Go Search API

api_list.name: Get Search Results
api_list.description: Insert the search query and retrieve the most relevant results from DuckDuckGo Search in JSON format.

required_parameters.name: search
required_parameters.description: The search string of your choice.

optional_parameters.name: nb_results
optional_parameters.description: The number of results you want to retrieve.
